<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shadowmist Cape](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2143)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cape

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black cape flows more like a vaporous liquid than fabric. The cape grants you a +3 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks. When you invest the cape, you either increase your Dexterity modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever is higher.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** A creature misses you with an attack;  **Effect** Attempt a Stealth check against the triggering creature's Perception DC. If you roll a success, you're [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from that creature until the end of your next turn or until right after you use a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) against that creature. If you roll a critical success, you're hidden from that creature until the end of your next turn, even if you use hostile actions against that creature.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** With a twirl of the cape, you transform yourself into a puff of gray smoke. You cast [_vapor form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1738) on yourself.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shadowmist Cape
